      static ConnectionProvider Util.connectionProvider(java.lang.String url, java.util.Properties properties) 
      static ConnectionProvider ConnectionProvider.from(java.sql.Connection connection)
      Warning: Don't pass one of these as a ConnectionProvider to a pool because once the pool closes the connection the pool cannot create a new one (the same closed connection is returned).
